== Brief Description ==

I'm Alessandro Pellegrini, I'm 20, I currently live in Rome, Italy. I am studying Informatic Engineering at La Sapienza in Rome, attending the second year.<<BR>>
I'm interested in computers (mostly programming and artificial intelligence), sci-fi, mathematics, music (classical, rock and metal), I play piano and guitar. I love languages as well, I speak italian, english, spanish and french, and I am now studying Japanese.
